name: Bat-World
description:
This is a... game? This is my first game. I made it entirely with mosi! Use the arrow keys to move around. Collect all the berries. There is no way to end it though, so just stop when you think you're done. What is this game even about? Take your best guess in the comments!

Mobile users: this game isn't optimised for mobile but it should still load; swipe in the direction you wish to move, it's a bit awkward I know.
